answers.answer: Hi, I have had type2 diabetes for 6 years now, I am having the exact same problems as your`s at the moment, but I was on medication 1000gm Diaformin twice daily, but had to cease medication because my glucose levels were dropping like yours, I am eating constantly to keep myself from having hypos, I have had CT scans of Liver and Pancreas, no results yet, I am having blood tests tomorrow, and will see my Physician next week, so hopefully I will know what the cause might be. See you doctor as soon as, beacuse worrying about it makes things worse.
Hi, how are you, hope all is fine, have you found out why you keep having hypos, I still have no results from my doctor either, and am still having trouble keeping my glucose levels up.Marie

title: uncontrolled hypoglycemia in a type 2 diabetic??
